title: How to Draw a Baseball Cap

steps.title: Begin by drawing a semicircle.
steps.content: Begin by drawing a semicircle. This will be the part of the hat that will rest on your head.

steps.title: Add the visor.
steps.content: Add the visor. To do so, first draw a rectangle, then add a small triangle beneath it. Also draw a small half-oval on top of the semicircle you drew in step one.

steps.title: Add the curves for the cap.
steps.content: Add the curves for the cap. This includes the curve of the visors and the division of the base (see image).

steps.title: Ink the drawing.
steps.content: Ink the drawing. Erase the sketch.

steps.title: Color and shade the drawing.
steps.content: Color and shade the drawing. You're done!

steps.title: Draw a semi oval.
steps.content: Draw a semi oval. Do this at the right side of the hemisphere. Draw a curved line over the narrow part of the semi oval.

steps.title: Outline the shape of the hat over the sketch.
steps.content: Outline the shape of the hat over the sketch.

steps.title: Erase the sketch carefully.
steps.content: Erase the sketch carefully. Add in details.

steps.title: Line the drawing with a black liner.
steps.content: Line the drawing with a black liner. Erase the pencil and add in color.
